readme:
## Sunburst Theme

Sunburst is an atom port of the TextMate sunburst theme.

### Installation

Run the following command:

```sh
apm install sunburst
```

Then go to `Atom > Preferences > Themes` and in the `Syntax Themes` dropdown, select `Sunburst` from the list.
